item.description: 假设一个二项分布事件，要求估计出参数theta drive = c('texting','texting','texting','not','not', 'texting','texting','not','not','texting') # convert to numeric, arbitrarily picking texting=1, not=0 driveNum = ifelse(drive=='texting', 1, 0) N = length(drive) # sample size nTexting = sum(drive=='texting') # number of drivers texting nNot = sum(drive=='not') # number of those not 我们武断设置一系列theta作为我们的先验概率，使用Kruschke方法限定先验概率接近0.5 theta = seq(from=1/(N+1), to=N/(N+1), length=10) ### prior distribution # uniform # pTheta = dunif(theta) # triangular as in Kruschke pTheta = pmin(theta, 1-theta) # beta prior with mean = .
